title: PMS 2.0 749 - Everything DB With Darius Butler LIVE From The ThunderDome, Hurricane Ian Update With Tampa Bay Buccaneers Beat Reporter Rick Stroud, & AJ Hawk
description: On today’s show, Pat, AJ Hawk, Darius Butler, and the boys chat about the official news that Zach Wilson is back for the Jets this week, keep an eye on Hurricane Ian and what that will mean for both college football and NFL games this weekend, the body cam footage from Myles Garrett’s accident this weekend, look ahead to tomorrow night’s Thursday Night Football game between the Dolphins and Bengals, and keep an eye on everything else happening around the NFL as we prepare for week 4. Joining the progrum to chat about Hurricane Ian, and what it means for not only Floridians, but for the Bucs/Chiefs game on Sunday Night is Buccaneers beat reporter and Tampa Bay resident, Rick Stroud (1:11:08-1:18:36). Later, Darius Butler breaks down the best Defensive Back plays from week 4 live from the ThunderDome in his weekly Everything DB Segment. Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow to watch the show. We appreciate the hell out of all you. See you tomorrow, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
